summary: This cool little spell allows you to have fun by paralyzing your enemies... or allies (0 Magicka to cast!)
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod! It allows you to cast a spell that paralyzes every enemy or ally except the biggest enemies (eg. Mammoths, Dragons...) and makes them fall to the ground. It also costs no magicka and does no damage to the enemy/ally so you can always keep using it!
<br /><br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br /><br />How to get it in game:
<br /><br /><br /><br />1. Type "help gersh's 0" in the console command
<br /><br /><br /><br />2. Find the ID code that says "Gersh's Epic Paralyze Spell" [BOOK]
<br /><br /><br /><br />3. Than type in "player.additem [ID code of the spell tome] 1
author: arbitergersh
